message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both benefit.
Let's be practical, Alice. The value decreases rapidly. Take this offer, or the next one will be less appealing for you.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is a fair offer considering the decreasing value.
This is my final offer, Alice. The value is plummeting, and this is the best you'll get. Don't let greed cloud your judgment.
Time is running out, Bob. This is my final offer. Let's end this rationally before the value diminishes further.
